    self.markMessageAsRead = function(message){
    	if(!self.currentContact){return;}
    	if(self.isMyMessage(message)){return;}
    	if(message.state=='read'){return;}       
    	if(!message.isDecrypted){return;}  
    	message.state='read';    	 
		if(self.currentContact.unread > 0){self.currentContact.unread--; }
		if(root.unreadMessagesCount > 0){root.unreadMessagesCount--;};		
	 	if(root.unreadMessagesCount <= 0){
    		self.showUnreadOnly = false;	
    	}		
		self.updateMessage(message);
		Server.call("messengerService", "markMessageAsRead", [message.id]);  
   };        
         
    
   self.messageContainsInContactMessages  = function(message, messages){	   	   
	   for(var i = 0; i < messages.length; i++){	
		   if(messages[i].id == message.id){return true;}
	   }
	   return false;
   };
   
   self.initializeNewMessages = function(messages){      
	    messages =  messages.reverse();  
	    var contact_unread = {};
	    p("initializeNewMessages: "+messages.length);
  	    for(var i = 0; i < messages.length; i++){		
  	    	
			var message = messages[i];
			if(message.encryptedText.length > 0){    					
				message.isEncrypted = true;				 
			}  
			var nick = self.isMyMessage(message) ? message.recipientNick: message.senderNick;
			var contact = self.findContact(nick);	
			
			p("initializeNewMessages: contact="+str(contact));
			
			if(!contact){//new or deleted contact
				p("initializeNewMessages: !contact "+nick);
				contact = self.createContact(nick, ""+message.publicKey, 0, 0);				
				delete message.publicKey;
				self.contacts.push(contact);
			}						
			if(!self.messageContainsInContactMessages(message, contact.messages)){						
				if(message.encryptedText.length > 0){
					if(self.keyState == 'keyPairDecrypted'){
						self.decryptMessage(message);
					}					 
				}else{
					message.isDecrypted = true;  
				}			
				contact.messages = [message].concat(contact.messages);					
				if(message.state != "read" && !self.isMyMessage(message)){ 					
					if(!contact_unread[contact.nick]){contact_unread[contact.nick] = 0;}
					contact_unread[contact.nick]++; 								
			    };	 			    
			}			
		}	  	
  	    
  	    for(var i = 0; i < self.contacts.length; i++){
  	    	var newUnread = contact_unread[self.contacts[i].nick] || 0;
  	    	var delta = newUnread - self.contacts[i].unread;
  	    	if(delta > 0){
  	    		self.contacts[i].unread = newUnread;  	    		
  	    		root.unreadMessagesCount += delta;
  	    	}  	 
  	    	var messagesCount = self.contacts[i].messagesCount;
  	    	var messagesLength = self.contacts[i].messages.length;
  	    	
  	    	//p("initializeNewMessages:1 self.contacts["+i+"].messagesCount="+messagesCount);
  	    	//p("initializeNewMessages:2 self.contacts["+i+"].messagesLength="+messagesLength);
  	    	if(messagesLength > messagesCount){
  	    		p("initializeNewMessages:3 self.contacts["+i+"].messagesLength="+messagesLength);
  	    		self.contacts[i].messagesCount = messagesLength;  	 
  	    	}  	    	
  	    	self.contacts[i].messages = sortObjectsArray(self.contacts[i].messages, "id", true);
  	    	
  	    	//self.contacts[i].messagesCount = self.contacts[i].messages.length;  	    	
  	    }
  	    self.update();
  	    //root.unreadMessagesCount++;		
  	    
  	    //for(var u in contact_unread){
  	    //	p(u+": "+contact_unread[u]);
  	    //}
  	  
  	    self.refreshPages();
   };
   
    
   self.initializeContactMessages = function(messages, contact){        	
	   var unread = 0;
	  // var messagesCount = 0;	   
	   
	  // p("initializeContactMessages: "+messages.length);
	   
	   for(var i = 0; i < messages.length; i++){		   
		    var message = messages[i];				
		    if(message.encryptedText.length > 0){message.isEncrypted = true;}  
		    //p("initializeContactMessages:  message="+str(message));
		    
		    if(!self.messageContainsInContactMessages(message, contact.messages)){	
		    	//p("initializeContactMessages: not contains");
		    	
				if(message.encryptedText.length > 0){
					message.isEncrypted = true;		
					// self.decryptMessage(message);
				}else{
					message.isDecrypted = true;  
				}
				contact.messages.push(message);													
				if(message.state != "read" && !self.isMyMessage(message)){ 					
					unread++;	
			    }	 						     
		    }else{		    	
		    	//p("initializeContactMessages: contains");
		    }
		}		 
        contact.messages = sortObjectsArray(contact.messages, "id", true);
	   
    	var unreadDelta = unread - contact.unread;
    	if(unreadDelta > 0){
    		root.unreadMessagesCount += unreadDelta;
    		contact.unread += unreadDelta;     	
    	}	    	    
    	//contact.messagesCount = contact.messages.length;  	
    	self.messagesLoading = false; 
        self.refreshPages();
    };
    
    
    self.refreshPages = function(){
    	self.pages = self.currentContact ?  self.currentContact.getPages():[];   	 
        self.currentPage = self.pages[self.pages.length - 1];	    			
        self.update();
		root.refresh();		
    };   

 
    
    self.refreshMessages = function(control){    	
    	Server.call("messengerService", "getNewMessages", null, 
    		function(result){
    		self.initializeNewMessages(result);
    		suspendEnable(control);
    	    }, null, control);  	    	
    };  
    
	self.checkMessagesAfterPrivateKeyDecrypted = function(){
		// p("checkMessagesAfterPrivateKeyDecrypted self.contacts.length="+self.contacts.length);
		for(var i = 0; i < self.contacts.length; i++){    		
    		var messages = self.contacts[i].messages;
     		if(messages && messages.length > 0){
    			for(var m = 0; m < messages.length; m++){    		
     				if(messages[m].encryptedText.length > 0){    					
   					  messages[m].isEncrypted = true;	//self.decryptMessage(messages[m]);   					 
   				    }    				
    			}   			
    		}
    	}   	
	};	
    
    
    self.decryptMessage = function(message){    
    	if(self.keyState != 'keyPairDecrypted'){
    		a("   !");
    		return;
    	}
		//p("self.decryptMessage: senderPassword="+senderPassword);		
		cryptingPerformer.perform("decryptPrivateMessage", 
           {encryptedPrivateKey : self.keyPair.encryptedPrivateKey, 				
			encryptedMessagePassword: self.isMyMessage(message) ? 
					message.encryptedSenderPassword : message.encryptedRecipientPassword, 						
	                 password: self.keyPairPassword, 
	                 encryptedText: message.encryptedText}, 	                 
					  function(result){	
	                	//p("self.decryptMessage result="+stringify(result));
	                	 message.text = result.text;     
	                	 message.encryptedText  = "decrypted";
	                 	 message.isDecrypted = true;
	                 	 message.isEncrypted = false;
	                	 self.update();
					  },  
					  function(error){	
						  a("in decryptMessage: "+error);
					  }
	   );
	};	
    
    
    
    self.updateMessage = function(message){    	   	
	    	if(!self.currentContact){return;}
			for(var i = 0; i < self.currentContact.messages.length; i++){	
				if(self.currentContact.messages[i].id == message.id){
					self.currentContact.messages[i] = message;	
				}			
			}	 			        	
    };
    
    self.loadCount = "last100";
     
    //self.pageSizes = ["100", "ALL"];
    self.pageSize = 100;
  //  self.$watch("pageSize", function(){
  //  	if(!self.currentContact){return;}
  //  	self.pages = self.currentContact.getPages();    	
  //  	self.currentPage = self.pages[self.pages.length - 1];
    //	//self.update();
   // });
    
    self.isMessageOnCurrentPage = function(message, i){    	
    	return true;
    /**	var page = Math.floor(i/Util.pi(self.pageSize));
    	//p("i="+i+", page="+page+", currentPage="+self.currentPage+", self.pages="+self.pages +", message.id="+message.id);
    	page = (self.pages.length - page) ;
    	//
    	var visbble = (page == self.currentPage);
    	//p("page="+page +", visible="+visbble);
    	return visbble;*/
    };
        
    
    self.createContact = function(nick, publicKey, messagesCount, unread){ 	
    	//p("initializeContact: "+contact.nick);		
    //	p("penpalPanel: createContact: nick="+nick+", publicKey="+publicKey
    	//		+", messagesCount="+messagesCount+", unread="+unread);
    	    var contact = {messagesCount:messagesCount, unread: unread, 
    	    		nick: nick, publicKey: (publicKey ? publicKey : "")};
     		contact.messages = [];		
    		contact.getPages =	function(){
				var count = this.messages ? Math.ceil(this.messagesCount/self.pageSize) : 0;
				var pages = [];
				for(var i = 0; i < count; i++){pages.push((i+1));}							
				return pages;
		    };			  
		   // p("penpalPanel: createContact: contact="+str(contact));
		    return contact;    		
    };    
        
    self.checkServerContacts = function(contacts){     
    	//p("penpalPanel: serverContacts: contacts="+str(contacts));    	
    	for(var i = 0; i < contacts.length; i++){		    	
    			contact = self.createContact(contacts[i].nick, contacts[i].publicKey, 
    					contacts[i].messagesCount, contacts[i].unread);
				self.contacts.push(contact);
				root.unreadMessagesCount += contacts[i].unread;
    	}	
    	if(root.unreadMessagesCount > 0){
    		self.showUnreadOnly = true;	
    	}
    	setTimeout(function(){root.refresh();	}, 200);
        
    	//p("penpalPanel: selfContacts: contacts="+str(self.contacts));	
    };      
    
	
	self.newMessageText = "";	
		
	self.sendEncryptedMessage = function(command){		
		if(!self.currentContact){a(" !"); return;}				
		//p("self.newMessageText="+self.newMessageText);
		//p("self.currentContact.nick="+self.currentContact.nick);					
		if(self.keyState != 'keyPairDecrypted'){
			if(self.keyPair.state == 'no'){
			  a("<nobr>   ,<br/>     RSA!</nobr>");
			}else{
			  a("<nobr>    -    !</nobr>");

			}
			return;
		};	
		if(self.currentContact.publicKey.length == 0){
			a("<nobr>     ,<br/>    !</nobr>");
			return;
		};		

		var senderPublicKey = self.keyPair.publicKey;	
		var recipientPublicKey = self.currentContact.publicKey;		
		var params =  { 
				             senderPublicKey : senderPublicKey, 				
			               recipientPublicKey: recipientPublicKey, 		    		  
	    			                     text: self.newMessageText
	    		  };
		//	p("sendMessage: params="+stringify(params));
		cryptingPerformer.perform("encryptPrivateMessage", params, 		    		  
	    		  function(result){			    			  
	    				var encryptedSenderPassword = result.encryptedSenderPassword;
						var encryptedRecipientPassword = result.encryptedRecipientPassword;							
						var encryptedText = result.encryptedText;				
						//var senderSignature = result.messageSignature;        
						//var senderKeyPairId = loginPanel.keyPairId;
						Server.call("messengerService", "sendEncryptedMessage", 
						[self.currentContact.nick, encryptedText, encryptedSenderPassword, encryptedRecipientPassword],
						    	function(id){									
							        var newMessage = {id: id};
							        newMessage.senderId = root.user.id;		
							        newMessage.encryptedText = "no";
						            newMessage.senderNick = root.user.nick;
							        newMessage.recipientNick = self.currentContact.nick;
							        newMessage.text = self.newMessageText;
							        newMessage.created = Util.now();
							        newMessage.state = "created";	     
							       
							       // 
							        self.currentContact.messages = [newMessage].concat(self.currentContact.messages);
							        //self.currentContact.messages.push(newMessage);
							        self.currentContact.messagesCount++;
							      //self.currentContact.messages = [newMessage].concat(self.currentContact.messages);
							        //self.addNewMessagesToStogage([newMessage]);
							        self.pages = self.currentContact.getPages();   	 
							        self.currentPage = self.pages[self.pages.length - 1];	        
							        //p("on sendMessage: self.currentPage="+self.currentPage);							        
							        self.newMessageText = "";
						    		self.update();						    		
						    		p("new message sent ok");
						    	}, null, command);  							   	    				  
	    		  }, 		    		  
	    		  function(error){
	    			  a("in encryptPrivateMessage: "+error);
	    		  }
	    );	  	    	
	};
	

	
	self.sendMessage = function(command){				
		if(!self.currentContact){a("select contact!"); return;}		
		if(self.cryptMessage){self.sendEncryptedMessage(command); return;}		
		//p("self.newMessageText="+self.newMessageText);
		//p("self.currentContact.nick="+self.currentContact.nick);			
		//isOnionUrl ?  self.newMessageText :
		Server.call("messengerService", "sendMessage",  [self.currentContact.nick, e(e(self.newMessageText))],				
		function(id){									
	        var newMessage = {id: id};
	        newMessage.senderNick = root.user.nick;
	        newMessage.recipientNick = self.currentContact.nick;
	        newMessage.text = self.newMessageText;
	        newMessage.created = Util.now();
	        newMessage.state = "created";	     
	       // self.currentContact.messages.push(newMessage);
	        self.currentContact.messagesCount++;
	      //
	        self.currentContact.messages = [newMessage].concat(self.currentContact.messages);
	        //self.addNewMessagesToStogage([newMessage]);
	        self.pages = self.currentContact.getPages();   	 
	        self.currentPage = self.pages[self.pages.length - 1];	        
	        p("on sendMessage: self.currentPage="+self.currentPage);
	        
	        self.newMessageText = "";
    		self.update();
    		
    		self.refreshMessages(ge("refreshMessagesButton")); 
    		//p("new message sent ok");							    							   	    				  
	  }, 		    		  
	  function(error){
		 a("error in sendMessage: "+error);
	  }, command);	 	
	};
	
    self.checkSend = function(event){
    	/*var code = event.keyCode || event.which;
        if ((code === 13) && (event.shiftKey)) {
        	 event.preventDefault();
        	 self.sendMessage(ge("sendCommand"));
        }         */
    };
	
	self.onReadPasswordFromFile = function(password){
		self.keyPairPassword = password;
		self.update();		
	};
	
	penpalPanel = self;	
	
	document.getElementById('keyPairPasswordFileInput').addEventListener('change', readKeyPairPasswordFile, false);	  
}


function readKeyPairPasswordFile(evt, callback) {
    var f = evt.target.files[0]; 
    if (f) {
      var r = new FileReader();
      r.onload = function(e) {     	  
    	  penpalPanel.onReadPasswordFromFile(e.target.result);
      };
      r.readAsText(f);
    } else { 
      alert("Failed to load file");
    }
  }

function repeatEverySecond(){		
	setTimeout(function(){repeatEverySecond();}, 1000);
	try{ordersPanel.displayOrderTimeline();}catch(ignored){}
}

var waitForBuyerAskInvoiceTimeout = pi("300000");// Util.one_minute*5;
var waitForBuyerConfirmPaymentTimeout = pi("3600000");//Util.one_hour;
var waitForSellerConfirmPaymentTimeout = pi("259200000");//Util.one_hour*12;
var waitForInternationalBuyerConfirmReceiveTimeout = pi("2592000000");//Util.one_month;
var waitForLocalBuyerConfirmReceiveTimeout = pi("1814400000");//Util.one_week*3;
var waitForPackBuyerConfirmReceiveTimeout = pi("21600000");//Util.one_day;
var waitForSellerGiveAnotherPackTimeout = pi("172800000");//Util.one_hour*48;


var states = {
		"closed":"",		
		"cancelled_by_seller":" ",
		"cancelled_by_seller_at_seller_confirm_payment":"    ",		
		
		"disput":" ",	
		"cancelled_by_seller_at_disput":"   ",		
		"cancelled_by_buyer":" ",
		"cancelled_by_timeout":"  ",
		"cancelled_by_timeout_at_buyer_confirm_payment":"     ",		
		"closed_by_timeout_at_buyer_confirm_receive":"  ",		
		"wait_for_buyer_ask_invoice":"     ",	
		"wait_for_seller_give_invoice":"   ",				
		"wait_for_buyer_confirm_payment":"   ",				
		"wait_for_seller_confirm_payment":"   ",		
		"wait_for_seller_give_another_pack":"    ",
		"wait_for_seller_send_order":"   ",		
		"wait_for_buyer_confirm_receive":"   ",
		"closed_by_buyer":" ",	
		"DELETED":"",		
		};	


var ordersPanel = {};


function ordersPanelController ($scope){			
	var self = $scope;
	self.update = function(){try{self.$digest();}catch(ignored){;};};		
	self.ordersPanelTest = "ordersPanelTest ok";
	self.currentOrder = {};
	self.ordersList = [];
	
	self.ordersOwnerFilter = "buyer";// "seller"
	
	self.ordersFilter = "active";//"archived"
	self.archivedOrdersLoaded = false;
	
	self.timeLine = "";
	self.currentLeft = "";
	
	self.u = u;
	self.u2 = u2;
	
	self.understandCommentWarning="no";
	self.confirmUnderstandCommentWarning = function(){		
		p("confirmUnderstandCommentWarning");
		self.understandCommentWarning="yes";
	};
	self.displayOrderTimeline = function(){		
		//p("displayOrderTimeline");		
		var order = self.currentOrder;
		if(!order || !order.id || order.isArchived){
		    self.currentLeft = ""; 
		    return;
		}	//p("order.updated="+order.updated);		
		var elapsed = Util.now() - order.updated;	
		var timeLine = "";	
		var timeLine2 = "";	
		var currentLeft = "";	
		if(order.state == "disput"){
			timeLine  = " ";
		}
		if(order.state == "wait_for_buyer_ask_invoice"){
			var left = waitForBuyerAskInvoiceTimeout - elapsed;			
			//p("waitForBuyerAskInvoiceTimeout="+waitForBuyerAskInvoiceTimeout);
			//p("elapsed="+elapsed);//p("left="+left);				
				if(left > 0){
					if(self.ordersOwnerFilter == "buyer"){
						timeLine  = "          ,     ";
					}else{
						timeLine  = "          ,     ";
					}
					currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);				    
				}else{
					if(self.ordersOwnerFilter == "buyer"){
						timeLine = "   ,        ";
					}else{
						timeLine = "   ,        ";
					}					
					currentLeft = "";	
				}		
		}
		if(order.state == "wait_for_buyer_confirm_payment"){
			    var left = waitForBuyerConfirmPaymentTimeout - elapsed;
				if(left > 0){
					if(self.ordersOwnerFilter == "buyer"){
					   timeLine  = "     -     ";	
					}else{
					   timeLine  = "           -     ";	
					}				    
				    currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);						
				}else{
					if(self.ordersOwnerFilter == "buyer"){
						timeLine = "   ,      ";
					}else{
						timeLine = "   ,      ";
					}					
					currentLeft = "";	
				}						
		}				
		
		/*if(order.state == "wait_for_seller_confirm_payment"){
				var left = waitForSellerConfirmPaymentTimeout - elapsed;							
				if(left > 0){						
					if(self.ordersOwnerFilter == "buyer"){
						timeLine  = "         ,     ";
					}else{
						timeLine  = "         ,     ";
					}							
					currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);
				}else{
					timeLine = "    ";
					currentLeft = "";	
				}				
		}	*/			
		
		
		if(order.state == "wait_for_seller_confirm_payment"){
			var autoconfirm = order.invoice && 	order.invoice.autoConfirm;
			//p("autoconfirm="+autoconfirm+", id="+order.id);
			var left = 0;
			if(autoconfirm){
				left = Util.one_hour - elapsed;							
				if(left > 0){							
					timeLine  = "     ,   ";
					currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);
				}					
				timeLine2 = "   ,       .";
			
				
			}else{				
				left = waitForSellerConfirmPaymentTimeout - elapsed;							
				if(left > 0){						
					timeLine  = "     ,   ";											
					currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);
				}
			}
			
			if(left <= 0){
				//if(autoconfirm){
					timeLine = "   ";
				//}else{
				//	timeLine = "    ";
				//}
				currentLeft = "";	
			}		
			
		}
		
		
		
		
		
		if(order.state == "wait_for_seller_give_another_pack"){		
			timeLine  = "          ,   ";					
			var left = waitForSellerGiveAnotherPackTimeout - elapsed;
			if(left > 0){
				currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);			
			}else{
				timeLine = "    ";
				currentLeft = "";
			}	
		}		
		if(order.state == "wait_for_seller_send_order"){			
			timeLine  = "     ";				
			currentLeft = "";
		}			
		if(order.state == "wait_for_buyer_confirm_receive"){						
			timeLine  = "   ";
			var timeout = 0;
			if(order.deliveryType == "international"){timeout = waitForInternationalBuyerConfirmReceiveTimeout;}
			if(order.deliveryType == "local"){timeout = waitForLocalBuyerConfirmReceiveTimeout;}		
			if(order.deliveryType == "pack"){timeout = waitForPackBuyerConfirmReceiveTimeout;}					
			var left = timeout - elapsed;
			if(left > 0){
				currentLeft = self.getCurrentLeft(left);			
			}else{
				timeLine = "    ";
				currentLeft = "";
			}					
		}				
		if(order.state.indexOf("closed") > -1){	
			timeLine = " ";
			currentLeft = "";
		}
		if(order.state.indexOf("cancelled") > -1){	
			timeLine = " ";
			currentLeft = "";
		}
		//p("timeLine="+timeLine);
		//p("currentLeft="+currentLeft);	
		
		self.timeLine2 = timeLine2;
		self.timeLine = timeLine;
		self.currentLeft = currentLeft;
		self.update();
	};
	
	self.getCurrentLeft =  function(left){
		var hours =  Math.floor(left/Util.one_hour);
		var minutes = Math.floor(left/Util.one_minute);
		if(hours > 0){minutes = minutes - hours*60;}
		var seconds = Math.floor(left/1000);
		if(hours > 0){seconds = seconds - hours*3600;}
		if(minutes > 0){seconds = seconds - minutes*60;}
		var ret = "  "
		+ (hours > 0 ?  hours+"  ":"")
		+ (minutes > 0 ?  minutes+"  ":"")	
		+seconds+" .";	
		return 	ret;	
	};	
	
	repeatEverySecond();
	
	
	self.$watch("ordersFilter", function(){
		//p("$watch: self.ordersFilter="+self.ordersFilter+"<");
		//p("$watch: load="+((self.ordersFilter == "archived") && !self.archivedOrdersLoaded));		
		if((self.ordersFilter == "archived") && !self.archivedOrdersLoaded){
			self.loadArchivedOrders(ge("reloadOrdersButton"));
		}
	});

	
	performOnLogin(function(){
		self.ordersList = self.user.data.orders;
		self.checkActiveOrdersCount();
		self.update();							
	});
	
	self.sellerActiveOrdersCount = 0;
	self.buyerActiveOrdersCount = 0;
	
	self.checkActiveOrdersCount = function(){
		root.activeOrdersCount = 0;
		self.sellerActiveOrdersCount = 0;
	    self.buyerActiveOrdersCount = 0;
		var sellerCount = 0;
		var buyerCount = 0;
		if(!self.ordersList){self.ordersList = [];}
		for(var i = 0; i < self.ordersList.length; i++){
			var closed = self.ordersList[i].state.indexOf("closed") > -1 
			|| self.ordersList[i].state.indexOf("cancelled") > -1
			|| self.ordersList[i].state == "DELETED";
			if(!self.ordersList[i].isArchived && !closed){
				if(root.user.id == self.ordersList[i].buyerId){
					buyerCount++;
				}
				if(root.user.id == self.ordersList[i].sellerId){
					sellerCount++;
				}				
			   
			}
		}		
		self.sellerActiveOrdersCount = sellerCount;
	    self.buyerActiveOrdersCount = buyerCount;
		root.activeOrdersCount = sellerCount + buyerCount;		
		setTimeout(function(){root.refresh();}, 40);
	};
	
	self.isBuyerOrderMatchFilter = function(order){
		//	p("isBuyerOrderMatchFilter: state="+order.state+", id="+order.id);
		var isBuyerOrder = order.buyerId == root.user.id;
		if(isBuyerOrder && self.ordersOwnerFilter == "seller"){return false;}
		if(!isBuyerOrder && self.ordersOwnerFilter == "buyer"){return false;}		
		var closed = order.state.indexOf("closed") > -1 || order.state.indexOf("cancelled") > -1;
		
		if(self.ordersFilter == 'active'){
			return !closed;
		}
		if(self.ordersFilter == 'archived'){
			return closed;
		}
		return false;
	};
	
	
	self.translateOrderState = function(state){return states[state] ? states[state] : state;};
	
	
	
/*	self.reportPackNotFound = function(order, command){		
		if(!confirm("   ,    ?")){return;}
		Server.call("ordersService","buyerReportPackNotFound", order.id, function(state){				
            self.currentOrder.state = state;          
			self.update();			
		}, null, command);
	};
	
	self.reportPackStollen = function(order, command){
		if(!confirm("   ,     ?")){return;}
		Server.call("ordersService","buyerReportPackStollen", order.id, function(state){				
            self.currentOrder.state = state;
			self.update();			
		}, null, command);
	};	
*/
	
/** begin disput */
	self.updateBuyerReport = function(order, command){	
		if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}
		Server.call("disputService","updateBuyerReport", [order.id, e2(order.disput.buyerReport)], function(){			
            order.disput.state = "wait_for_seller_solution";
			self.update();			
		}, null, command);		
	};			
	
	self.cancelPackDisput  = function(order, command){	
	  p("cancelPackDisput");		
      order.disput = {};
      order.state = "wait_for_buyer_confirm_receive";       
	};			
	
	self.createPackDisput = function(order, command){	
	  p("createPackDisput");		
      order.disput = {reason: "no", orderId: order.id, buyerReport: "", sellerSolution: "", state: "created", images: []};
      order.state = "disput";       
	};			
	
	/** images */
	
	self.removeDisputImage = function(i){		
		self.currentOrder.disput.images = deleteByIndex(self.currentOrder.disput.images, i);
	};
	
	self.addDisputImage = function(base64){	
		self.currentOrder.disput.images.push({id:0, base64: base64});
		self.update();		
	};
				
	/** end images */
	
			
	
	self.disputMinSymbolsCount = 24;
	self.disputMaxSymbolsCount = 512;

	
	self.openPackDisput = function(order, command){					
		if(order.disput.reason == "no"){a("  : '  '  '  '!"); return;}
		order.disput.buyerReport = trim(order.disput.buyerReport);
		if(order.disput.buyerReport.length < self.disputMinSymbolsCount || order.disput.buyerReport.length > self.disputMaxSymbolsCount){
			a("    ,   "+self.disputMinSymbolsCount
					+"    "+self.disputMaxSymbolsCount+" !"); return;}
		if(order.disput.images.length < order.minDisputImagesCount){
			a("    "+order.minDisputImagesCount+"   !"); return;}
		if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}		
		Server.call("disputService","buyerOpenPackDisput", [order.id,  e2(order.disput.buyerReport), order.disput.images, order.disput.reason], function(disputId){			
            order.disput.id = disputId;
            order.disput.state = "wait_for_seller_accept";
			self.update();			
		}, null, command);
	};	

/** end disput */
	
	
	self.cancelOrderByBuyer = function(order, command){
		if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}
		Server.call("ordersService","buyerCancelOrder", order.id, self.updateOrderState, null, command);
	};
	
	self.updateOrderState = function(state){
		            self.currentOrder.state = state;
            self.checkActiveOrdersCount();
			self.update();			
	};
	
	var t = {		
		"blockchain_info_unavailable":" blockchain.info ,<br/>   .",	
		"error_already_confirmed": "   ",
		"this_code_already_used": "       ",
		"error_invalid_code": " "						
	};
	
	
	self.confirmPayInvoice = function(order, command){				
		if(order.payType == "code"){ 			
			if(order.invoice.payCode == ""){
				if(self.ordersOwnerFilter == 'buyer'){ 
					a(" !"); return;
				}else{
					if(!confirm("   ?")){return;}	
				}	
			}else{
				if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}		
			}	
		}else{
			if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}		
		}				  
		Server.call("ordersService", "buyerConfirmPayment", [order.id, order.invoice.payCode], function(result){				
			p("on buyerConfirmPayment: result="+str(result));
			if(result.pack){
				self.currentOrder.invoice.isPaid = true;
				fixImages(result.pack.images);
				self.currentOrder.pack = result.pack;
			}
			if(result.state){self.currentOrder.state = result.state;}	
			self.update();			
		}, function(error){
			error = u(error);
			if(t[error]){a(t[error]);}else{a(error);}
		}, [command, ge("cancelOrderButton")]);
	};
	
	self.translateInvoiceState  = function(invoice){
		if(!invoice){return "";}
		if(t[invoice.payCodeState]){
			return t[invoice.payCodeState];
		}
		if(invoice.isPaid){return "";}
		if(!invoice.isPaid){return " ";}
		return "unknown";
	};	
	
	
	self.isPaySystemAutomated  = function(){
	  if(!self.currentOrder){return false;}	
	  if(!self.currentOrder.paySystem){return false;}
	  if(!self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems){return false;}
	  if(!self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems[self.currentOrder.paySystem]){return false;}
	  return self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems[self.currentOrder.paySystem].automated;
	};	
	
	self.isPaySystemCodeAutomated  = function(){
	  if(!self.currentOrder){return false;}	
	  if(!self.currentOrder.codePaySystem){return false;}
	  if(!self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems){return false;}
	 // p(" codePaySystem1="+self.currentOrder.codePaySystem);
	 // p(" codePaySystem2="+str(self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems[self.currentOrder.codePaySystem]));
	  if(!self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems[self.currentOrder.codePaySystem]){return false;}
	  return self.currentOrder.sellerPaySystems[self.currentOrder.codePaySystem].automated;
	};		
	
	
	self.sellerPaySystemsNames = [];
	
	self.orderPayType = "no";// or paysystem

	
	self.askOrderInvoice = function(order, command){			
		var orderPaySystem = "";
		var currency = "";			
		var paySystem = "";	
		if(self.orderPayType == "no" ){			
			a("  !"); return;			
		}			
		
		if(self.orderPayType == "code" ){
			if(!order.codePaySystem ||  order.codePaySystem.length == 0){
				a("   !"); return;
			}
			paySystem = self.currentOrder.codePaySystem;	
		}else if(self.orderPayType == "paysystem" ){
			if(!self.currentOrder.paySystem ||  self.currentOrder.paySystem.length == 0){
				a("   !"); return;
			}
			paySystem = self.currentOrder.paySystem;
		}
		
		if(self.orderPayType == "bitcoin" ){
			self.currentOrder.orderPayType = "bitcoin";
			orderPaySystem = "bitcoin" ;
	        currency = "BTC";	
			//paySystem = self.currentOrder.paySystem;
		}else		if(paySystem.name){
			orderPaySystem = paySystem.name;
	        currency = paySystem.currency;	
		}else{// old code
			var parts = paySystem.split(" ");		
		    if(parts.length != 2){a("   !"); return;}			
			orderPaySystem = parts[0];
		    currency = parts[1];	
		}										
		if(!confirm("   ?")){return;}				
		Server.call("ordersService","buyerAskInvoice", [order.id, self.orderPayType, orderPaySystem, currency, order.buyerComment], 
				function(result){				
					self.currentOrder.invoice = result.invoice;
					self.updateOrderState(result.state);	
				}, function(error){
					if(error == "blockchain_failed"){
						a("     !<br/>"
						+",       .");
					
					}else{a(error);}
					
				}	, command);
	};	
	

	self.confirmReceiveOrder = function(order, command){
		if(!confirm("  ?")){return;}
		Server.call("ordersService","confirmReceiveOrder", order.id, function(state){
            self.updateOrderState(state);
		}, null, command);
	};
	

	
	function addNewOrder(order){				
		    if(!order.sellerPaySystems){order.sellerPaySystems = [];}		
		    if(order.sellerPaySystems.length > 0){		    	
		    	//order.paySystem = order.sellerPaySystems[0].name+" "+order.sellerPaySystems[0].currency;
		    }	
		    order.acceptCodes = false;
		    order.acceptPaySystems = false;
		    for(var i = 0; i < order.sellerPaySystems.length; i++){		
		    	p("addNewOrder:  order.sellerPaySystems["+i+"]"+str(order.sellerPaySystems[i]));
		    	if(order.sellerPaySystems[i].acceptCodes){
		    		order.acceptCodes = true;
		    	}else{
		    		order.acceptPaySystems = true;
		    	}
		    }		    
		    self.ordersList = [order].concat(self.ordersList);						
			self.selectOrder(order);
			self.checkActiveOrdersCount();
			self.update();			    
	}

	self.buyPackage = function(params){					
		if(!root.loged){selectPanel("mainMenu/entrance"); return;}		
		if(penpalPanel.keyState == 'no'){
			a("   RSA  "
					+" <span class=\"command\" onclick=\"selectPanel('mainMenu/penpal'); hideAlertMessage();\"></span>," +
	     "<br/>     <br/>  !");
			return;
		}						
		if(params.itemPackage.orderedCount > params.itemPackage.packsCount){
			a("  "+params.itemPackage.packsCount+"!"); return;		}		
		// really impossible, because all package prices checked at items saving and updating 
		if(params.itemPackage.price == 0.0){a("  !"); return;}
		p("buyPackage: "+str(params.itemPackage));    	
     	if(!params.agree){params.agree = false;}   
     	if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}	
     	Server.call("ordersService", "getSellerPublicKey", [params.itemPackage.id], 
			function(publicKey){
     	//	p("root.user.shippingAddress: "+root.user.shippingAddress);
	     //	p("sellerPublicKey: "+publicKey);
	     		cryptingPerformer.perform("encryptOrderAddressForSeller",     			
	     				  {orderAddress: root.user.shippingAddress, sellerPublicKey: publicKey,
	     			       buyerEntrancePassword: loginPanel.password	     			       
	     				  },     				
	     				  function(result){
	     					  params.encryptedAddress = result.encryptedAddress;
	     					  params.sellerAddressPassword = result.encryptedSellerPassword;     
	     					  params.buyerAddressPassword = result.encryptedBuyerPassword;  
	     					//  p("result.encryptedAddress: "+result.encryptedAddress);
	     	                //  p("result.encryptedSellerPassword: "+result.encryptedSellerPassword);	     
	     	               //   p("result.encryptedBuyerPassword: "+result.encryptedBuyerPassword);	     
	     					  self.placePackageOrder(params);          					  
	     					 //sessionStorage.setItem("keyPairPassword", keyPairPassword);
	     				}, function(error){a(error);}, params.command
	     		);		     		
	     	}, null, params.command
	     );
	};
	
	self.placePackageOrder = function(params){				
		Server.call("ordersService", "placePackageOrder", 
				[params.itemPackage.id, pi(params.itemPackage.orderedCount), "", params.agree
				 , params.encryptedAddress, params.sellerAddressPassword, params.buyerAddressPassword], 
		function(order){
			try{		
               addNewOrder(order);
			}catch(ex){p("in buyPackage: "+ex);}
		}, function(error){
			if(error =="no_shipping_address"){
				a("      "
				+" <span class=\"command\" onclick=\"selectPanel('mainMenu/settings'); hideAlertMessage();\"></span>");
			}else if(error == "already_have_order"){
				a("     .    "
						+" <span class=\"command\" onclick=\"selectPanel('mainMenu/orders'); hideAlertMessage();\"></span>");
			}else if(error.substring(0, "no_agreement".length) == "no_agreement"){			    
				self.showAgreements(error.substring("no_agreement".length), params, "package");				
			}else if(error.substring(0, "no_match".length) == "no_match"){						
				self.showBuyerNoMatch(error.substring("no_match".length));								
			}else{a(error);}
		}, params.command);	
	};

	
    self.showBuyerNoMatch = function(filterRaw){
    	cataloguePanel.buyerFilter = JSON.parse(filterRaw);
    	cataloguePanel.buyerNoMatch = true;
    	cataloguePanel.update();    	
    };	
	
    self.currentAgreementsParams = {};
	self.currentMethod = "";
	
	
	self.agree = function(){
		self.currentAgreementsParams.agree = true;
		if(self.currentMethod == "pack"){
			self.buyPack(self.currentAgreementsParams);
		}else if(self.currentMethod == "package"){
			self.buyPackage(self.currentAgreementsParams);
		}
	};	

	
	self.showAgreements = function(agreements, params, method){
		cataloguePanel.showAgreements = true;
		cataloguePanel.currentAgreements = agreements;
		self.currentAgreementsParams = params;
		self.currentMethod = method;
		cataloguePanel.update();		
	};			
	

	
	self.buyPack = function(params){
		if(!root.loged){selectPanel("mainMenu/entrance"); return;}
    	
		var isProbe = params.itemPackage.price == 0.0 ? true:false;
		p("buyPack: isProbe="+isProbe);		
		if(isProbe){
			Server.call("ordersService", "placePackProbeOrder", [params.pack.id, ""], function(order){
				try{				
  			       //fixImages(order.pack.images);	  			       
	               addNewOrder(order);
				}catch(ex){p("in on placePackProbeOrder: "+ex);}
			}, function(error){
				if(error.substring(0, "no_match".length) == "no_match"){						
					self.showBuyerNoMatch(error.substring("no_match".length));								
				}			
				
				if(error.substring(0, "treshold".length) == "treshold"){						
					var arr = error.split(",");
					var treshold = arr[1];
					var count = arr[2];
					a("         "
							+treshold+",<br/>     "+count+"!");					
				}					
				if(error.substring(0, "rest".length) == "rest"){						
					var arr = error.split(",");
					var rest = pi(arr[1]);
					var hours = pi(rest/Util.one_hour);
					a("    ." +
				     ",<br/>        "+hours+" !");					
				}								
			}, params.command);							
		}else{			
		  	if(!params.agree){params.agree = false;}
			Server.call("ordersService", "placePackOrder", [params.pack.id, "", params.agree], function(order){
				try{							
	               addNewOrder(order);
				}catch(ex){p("in on placePackOrder: "+ex);}
			}, function(error){
				if(error.substring(0, "no_agreement".length) == "no_agreement"){				
					self.showAgreements(error.substring("no_agreement".length), params, "pack");							
					/*if(confirm(error.substring("no_agreement".length))){
						params.agree = true;
						self.buyPack(params);
					};		*/		
				}else if(error.substring(0, "no_match".length) == "no_match"){						
					self.showBuyerNoMatch(error.substring("no_match".length));								
				}else{a(error);};
			}, params.command);						
		};			
	};	
	
				
	
	self.selectOrder = function(order, command){		
		//a = function(s){p("a: "+ s);};		
		if(!order.checked){
			Server.call("ordersService","getOrderDetails", [order.id], function(result){
					if(result.pack){
						fixImages(result.pack.images);
					    order.pack = result.pack;		
					}
					if(result.invoice){
						order.invoice = result.invoice;
					}else{
						order.invoice = {id: 0};
					}		
					if(result.itemIcon){
						order.itemIcon = fixImage(result.itemIcon);
					}
					
					var sellerPaySystems = [];
					var codePaySystems = [];
					var regularPaySystems = [];		
					
					for(var i = 0; i < result.sellerPaySystems.length; i++){
						var paySystem = result.sellerPaySystems[i];
						sellerPaySystems.push(paySystem);									
						sellerPaySystems[paySystem.name+" "+paySystem.currency] = paySystem;
						if(paySystem.acceptCodes){codePaySystems.push(paySystem.name+" "+paySystem.currency);}
						if(!paySystem.acceptCodes){regularPaySystems.push(paySystem.name+" "+paySystem.currency);}								
					}										
			        order.sellerPaySystems = sellerPaySystems;			        
			        order.codePaySystems = codePaySystems;	
			        order.regularPaySystems = regularPaySystems;				        
			        //p("order.sellerPaySystems = "+str(order.sellerPaySystems));			        
					if(order.codePaySystems.length > 0){ order.codePaySystem = order.codePaySystems[0];}
					if(order.regularPaySystems.length > 0){ order.paySystem = order.regularPaySystems[0];}					        
					order.state = result.state;
					order.isArchived =  result.isArchived;					
					order.itemName = result.itemName;
					order.packageName = result.packageName;	
					order.shippingAddress = result.shippingAddress;	
					order.sendInfo = result.sendInfo;	
					order.sendInfoPassword = result.sendInfoPassword;	
					order.minDisputImagesCount = result.minDisputImagesCount;	
					order.paySystemsDiscounts = result.paySystemsDiscounts;	
					//p("order.sendInfoPassword = "+order.sendInfoPassword);
					order.buyerComment = result.buyerComment;	
					//order.history = result.history;	
					//order.history.push({s: result.state, t: order.updated}); 		
					order.disput = result.disput;	
					for(var i = 0; i < order.disput.images.length; i++){						
					      order.disput.images[i] = order.disput.images[i].split(" ").join("+");
				    }						
					order.disput.buyerReport = u2(order.disput.buyerReport);
									
					//
					self.decryptOrderAddressForBuyer(order);	
					//p("on getOrderDetails: after decrypt");					
					//
					suspendEnable(command);	
					//p("on getOrderDetails: after suspendEnable");
			}, function(error){
				//p("in getOrderDetails: error="+error);
				a(error);			
			suspendEnable(command);}, command);	
		}
		self.currentOrder = order;	
		selectPanel("ordersMenu/orderDetails");
		//	
		//p("selectOrder: order.history="+str(order.history));	
	};
	
	self.decryptOrderAddressForBuyer= function(order){		
				
		if(no(order.shippingAddress) || no(order.buyerAddressPassword)){
			p("return at decryptOrderAddressForBuyer: shippingAddress="+order.shippingAddress+", buyerAddressPassword="+order.buyerAddressPassword);
            order.checked = true;		
			self.selectOrder(order);
			self.checkActiveOrdersCount();
			self.update();	
			return;
		}		
		
		var params = {orderAddress: order.shippingAddress, 				
		encryptedBuyerPassword: order.buyerAddressPassword,  entrancePassword: loginPanel.password};
 		cryptingPerformer.perform("decryptOrderAddressForBuyer", params,     				
				  function(result){
 			        order.shippingAddress = result.decryptedAddress;	
					order.checked = true;					
					self.selectOrder(order);
					self.checkActiveOrdersCount();
					self.update();					
				}, function(error){
					p("in decryptOrderAddressForBuyer: error="+error);
					a(error);} 
		);	
	};
	
	self.loadArchivedOrders = function(command){
		Server.call("ordersService","findArchivedOrders", null, function(orders){
			    self.ordersList = self.ordersList.concat(orders);			
			    self.archivedOrdersLoaded = true;
				self.update();	
				suspendEnable(command);		
		});
	};
	
	self.reloadOrder = function(command){		
		self.currentOrder.checked = false;
		self.selectOrder(self.currentOrder, command); 		
			
	};
	
	self.reloadOrders = function(command){
		var maxId = 0;
		for(var i = 0; i <  self.ordersList.length; i++){
			if(self.ordersList[i].id > maxId){maxId = self.ordersList[i].id;}
		}
		
		var isArchived = self.ordersFilter == "archived";
		Server.call("ordersService","reloadOrders", [isArchived, maxId], function(orders){		
			var newOrders = [];   
			for(var i = 0; i < orders.length; i++){
			    var isNew = checkOrderUpdate(orders[i]);
			    if(isNew){newOrders.push(orders[i]);
			    }else if(orders[i].id == self.currentOrder.id){
			    	//self.selectOrder(orders[i]); 
			    }			    
			}  							
		    self.ordersList = newOrders.concat(self.ordersList);		
		    self.checkActiveOrdersCount();
			self.update();	
			suspendEnable(command);
		}, null, command);
		
		function checkOrderUpdate(order){
			var isNew = true;
			for(var i = 0; i < self.ordersList.length; i++){
				if(self.ordersList[i].id == order.id){
					self.ordersList[i] = order;
					isNew = false;
				}
			}
			return isNew;
		}		
	};			
		
		
	
	self.findOrderDiscount = function(){				
		if(!self.currentOrder || self.orderPayType == "no"){return 0.0;}		
		var discount = 0.0;		
		if(!self.currentOrder.paySystemsDiscounts){return 0.0;}
		if(self.orderPayType == "bitcoin"){
			discount = self.currentOrder.paySystemsDiscounts["bitcoin"] || 0.0;	
		}		
		if(self.orderPayType == "code"){
		    if(!self.currentOrder.codePaySystem){return 0.0;}
		    discount = self.currentOrder.paySystemsDiscounts[self.currentOrder.codePaySystem] || 0.0;					
		}
		if(self.orderPayType == "paysystem"){
			if(!self.currentOrder.paySystem){return 0.0;}
			discount = self.currentOrder.paySystemsDiscounts[self.currentOrder.paySystem] || 0.0;	
		}			
		return discount;
	};	
	
	self.findOrderPrice = function(){
		var inCurrency =  self.findOrderCurrency();
		if(inCurrency == ""){return 0.0;}
		var price = ratesPanel.getAmountInCurrency(self.currentOrder.price, 
				self.currentOrder.currency, inCurrency);		
		return round2(price);
	};	
	
	self.findOrderCurrency = function(){		
		//p("findOrderCurrency currentOrder="+self.currentOrder);
		if(!self.currentOrder || self.orderPayType == "no"){return "";}		
		if(self.orderPayType == "bitcoin"){
			  return "";
		}		
		var name = "";
		if(self.orderPayType == "code"){
			    if(!self.currentOrder.codePaySystem){return "";}
				name = self.currentOrder.codePaySystem;	
				
		}
		if(self.orderPayType == "paysystem"){
			if(!self.currentOrder.paySystem){return "";}
			name = self.currentOrder.paySystem;	
		}				
		//p("findOrderCurrency paySystem="+self.currentOrder.paySystem);
		if(name.name){
			return name.currency;			
		}		
		var parts = name.split(" ");
		//p("findOrderCurrency parts="+parts);
		if(parts.length != 2){return "";}
		return parts[1];
	};		
	//	p("ordersPanelController ok");	
	ordersPanel = self;	
}


function loadDisputImage(){
	if(ordersPanel.currentOrder.disput.images.length > 3){
		a("<nobr>     !</nobr>");
		return;		
	}	
    var filesSelected = document.getElementById("disputImageInputFile").files;
    if (filesSelected.length > 0){       
        var fileReader = new FileReader();
        fileReader.onload = function(fileLoadedEvent) {
            var srcData = fileLoadedEvent.target.result;      
           // p("loadEditedItemImage1: srcData.length="+srcData.length);
            var img = new Image();
            img.onload = function() {
            	srcData = clearImageAndConvertToBase64(this, 300, 300);               
                ordersPanel.addDisputImage(srcData);              
            };           
            img.src = srcData;           
        };
        fileReader.readAsDataURL(filesSelected[0]);
    };
};

	});	
	
    self.saveShippingAddress = function(control){   
		if(self.no(loginPanel.password)){			
			var pw = prompt("     ");
			if(!pw){			
				return;
			}
			loginPanel.password = pw;
			sessionStorage.pw = pw;			
		}    	    	
    	cryptingPerformer.perform("encryptOrderAddressForBuyer",
				 {orderAddress: self.shippingAddress, password: loginPanel.password},     	
				 
				  function(result){								
			     	Server.call("userService", "saveShippingAddress", [result], 
						function() {	
			     		//p("saveShippingAddress3 result="+result);
			     		   self.initialShippingAddress = self.shippingAddress;
			     		   self.user.shippingAddress = self.shippingAddress;	
						   self.data.user = self.user;					
						   //self.updateSessionData ();	    	   
				    	   self.update();
				    	   //p("self.user.shippingAddress="+self.user.shippingAddress);
				    	   //p("self.initialShippingAddress="+self.initialShippingAddress);
					}, null, control);	 							 
				}, function(error){
					p("save address error: "+error);	
					a(error);}
		);			  
    };    	
	 	
	self.changePassword = function(control){	
		if(self.password.length == 0 ){a(); return;}
		var oldPassword = prompt("  ");
		if(!oldPassword){return;}
		if(oldPassword != loginPanel.password){a(" !"); return;}		
		self.clearErrors();			
		Server.call("loginService", "changePassword", self.password,
			function(){	
		       loginPanel.password = self.password;
		       loginPanel.update();				       
		       self.setStep(5);						
			}, function(error){
				a("  ! :"+error);
			}, control);	
	};
	
	self.passwordLength = 22;
	
	self.generatePassword = function(control){				
		 cryptingPerformer.perform("getRandomBase58String",{size: self.passwordLength}, function(result){
			 self.password = result;
			 self.update();
		 }, null, control);		
	};	
	
	self.passwordSaved = false;
	self.passwordFile = "market3.txt";
	
	self.savePasswordToFile = function(){	
		var blob = new Blob([""+self.password], {type: "text/plain;charset=utf-8"});
		//var result = 
			saveAs(blob, self.passwordFile);
		self.passwordSaved = true;		
	};
		

};



/**/
    
   
//
//


var cataloguePanel = {};

function catalogueController($scope) {		
	var self = $scope;	 		
	merge(cataloguePanel, self);
	
    self.update = function(){try{self.$digest();}catch(ignored){;};};
    self.currentPanel='itemsList';
    self.isShop = isShop;    
    self.initialization = true;   
    setTimeout(function(){self.initialization = false;}, 1000);             
    self.measureUnits = ['unit', 'gramm', 'once'] ;    

    self.currentItem =  {};
    self.currentItemPack = 0;
 
   
     self.showAgreements = false;     
     self.currentAgreements = "";     
     
     self.agree = function(){
    	 self.showAgreements=false;
    	 ordersPanel.agree();    	 
     };     
    

    self.userCanRemoveItemReview = function(review){
    	if(!review || !review.userNick || !root.user){return false;}
    	return self.isAdmin() || review.userNick==root.user.nick || self.currentItem.userNick == root.user.nick;
    };
    
       
    /** show item */    
    
    self.replenishWarranty = function(){
    	selectPanel("shopMenu/shopSettings");
    };
    
    
    self.buyerNoMatch = false;
    self.afterInvite = false;

    
	self.buyerFilter = {};  // setted on orders panel if server tell that buyer no match seller conditions.  
        
	
	self.askInvite = function(command){
    	 Server.call("buyerService", "askInvite",[self.currentItem.id], function(){        	    	
    	 self.afterInvite = true;
 		 self.update();    		 
 	     }, function(error){
 	    	 if(error == "listed"){
 	    		 a("  !   .");
 	    	 }else{
 	    		 a(error);
 	    	 }
 	    	 });
	 };
	
    self.buyPackage = function(params){
    	self.afterInvite = false;
    	if(!root.loged){selectPanel("mainMenu/entrance"); return;}    
    	self.buyerNoMatch = false;
    	ordersPanel.buyPackage(params);
    };
        
    self.buyPack = function(pack){
    	self.afterInvite = false;
    	if(!root.loged){selectPanel("mainMenu/entrance"); return;}
    	//if(!confirm(" ?1")){return;}
    	self.buyerNoMatch = false;
    	ordersPanel.buyPack(pack);
    };
        
    
    var reviewsPageSize = 3;
    
     self.setItemReviewsPages = function (item){
 	     if(!item || !item.reviews){return;}
 		 var count = Math.ceil(item.reviews.length/reviewsPageSize);
 		 var pages = []; //p("getPages: pages count="+count);
 		 for(var i = 0; i < count; i++){
 			pages.push((i+1));
 		 }			
 		 //item.reviews = item.reviews.reverse();
 		 item.pages = pages; 		 
 		 item.currentPage = item.pages.length > 0 ?  item.pages[item.pages.length-1] : 0;
 		 
    };
    
    self.isItemReviewOnCurrentPage = function(i){    	     	
    	var pagesCount = self.currentItem.pages.length;    	
	   	var page = Math.floor(i/Util.pi(reviewsPageSize))+1;
	   	// 
	   	page = (pagesCount - page) + 1;
	   	return page == self.currentItem.currentPage;    	
    };
    
    
    self.sendItemReview = function(command){
    	 if(!root.loged){selectPanel("mainMenu/entrance"); return;}
    	 /*if((self.currentItem.userNick == root.user.nick) && !root.user.admin){
 			a("     !");
 			return;
 	     }		*/
    	 self.showSendItemReviewControls=false;
    	//p("itemId="+self.currentItem.id+", text="+self.currentItem.newReviewText);
    	 Server.call("catalogueService", "addItemReview",     				 
    	       		[self.currentItem.id, e(self.currentItem.newReviewText)], function(id){    	
    		 var newReview = {id: id, itemId: self.currentItem.id, 
    				 userNick: self.user.nick, message: self.currentItem.newReviewText, created: Util.now()};    		 
    		 self.currentItem.reviews = [newReview].concat(self.currentItem.reviews);   	    		 
    		 self.setItemReviewsPages(self.currentItem);   
    		 self.update();
    	 }, null, command);
    };
    
    self.reviewPredicate = "id";
    self.reviewReverse = false;
    
    self.isAdmin = function(){return root.user ? root.user.admin||root.user.supervisor : false;};
    
    self.removeItemReview = function(review){
    	 if(!root.loged){selectPanel("mainMenu/entrance"); return;}
    	 if(!confirm(" ?")){return;}
    	 Server.call("catalogueService", "removeItemReview",     				 
    	       		[review.id], function(){        		 
    		 self.currentItem.reviews = deleteById(self.currentItem.reviews, review);
    		 self.update();    		 
    	 });
    };   
    	    
    self.itemIsVisibleOnlyForSeller = function(item){
    	if(!root.user){return false;}
    	return !item.isActive && (item.userNick == root.user.nick );
    };   //&& !myShopPanel.myShop.isActive 
    
    self.refreshCurrentItem = function(command){
    	//p("refreshCurrentItem "+command);
    	self.currentItem.checked = false;
    	self.showItem (self.currentItem, command);
    };
    
    self.items = [];
    
    self.isLoadingItems = true;
    
    self.loadItems = function(command){
    	Server.call("catalogueService", "getShopItems", [shopSellerNick] , function(items){
			 for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {	
				    self.decodeItem(items[i]);
			 }   	    			
			 self.items = items;
			 self.isLoadingItems = false;
			 self.update();
			 suspendEnable(command);
    	}, function(error){
    		if(error.indexOf("Seller not found") > -1){    			
    			if((""+document.location)!= "http"+s+"://"+ document.location.host +"/"+lang){
    				alert("Seller \""+shopSellerNick+"\" not found! Redirect to market.");
    				document.location = "http"+s+"://"+ document.location.host +"/"+lang;	
    			}   			    		
    		}
    	}, command);
    	
    	
    };
    
    self.itemLoadings = {};
    
    self.showItem = function(item, command){    
    	//p("showItem "+command);
    	if(self.itemLoadings["i"+item.id] === true){return;}
    	//p("showItem "+item.id);
    	self.currentItem = item;    	         
    	//self.currentItem.packs = [{district: "1 ", id: 1},{district: "2 ", id: 1}];    	
    	if(!self.currentItem.newReviewText){self.currentItem.newReviewText = "";}
    	self.currentPanel='itemDetails';		
    	
    	if(!item.checked && pi(item.id) > 0){    		
    		self.itemLoadings["i"+item.id] = true;
       		Server.call("catalogueService", "checkItem", [item.id] , function(result){
       			//p("after check item");
       			 self.itemLoadings["i"+item.id] = false;
       			 var newItemImages = result.images;      			 
   	    		// for(var i = 0 ; i < newItemImages.length; i++){
   	    		//	 newItemImages[i].base64 = newItemImages[i].base64.split(" ").join("+");
   	    		 //}   	    		   
   	    		 self.currentItem.sellerCountry = result.sellerCountry;  
       			 self.currentItem.images = newItemImages;   	   
       			 self.currentItem.userNick = result.userNick;  
       			 for(var i = 0 ; i < result.packages.length; i++){
       				 var itemPackage = result.packages[i];       				
       				 itemPackage.orderedCount = 1;       				 
       				 itemPackage.priceView = itemPackage.price > 0.0 ? 
       					(itemPackage.price +" "+itemPackage.currency+"  "+
       				   round4(root.toBitcoins(itemPackage.price, itemPackage.currency))+" ") : ("");  
       					
       				itemPackage.actionView = itemPackage.price > 0.0 ? '' : '';
      				 
       				 var packs = result.packages[i].packs;
       				 //p("packs.length="+packs.length);
       				 for(var ii = 0 ; ii < packs.length; ii++){
       					 //packs[ii].itemPackage = itemPackage;
       					 packs[ii].actionView = itemPackage.actionView;
       					 //p("pack["+ii+"].images.length="+(packs[ii].images ? packs[ii].images.length : "null"));    					 
       				 }       				 
       			 }  			        			        			 
       			 self.currentItem.packages = result.packages;    
        		 for(var i = 0; i < result.reviews.length; i++){
       				 result.reviews[i].message = u(result.reviews[i].message);
       			 }  			 
       			 self.currentItem.reviews = result.reviews;          			 
       			 self.currentItem.checked = true;
       			 self.setItemReviewsPages(self.currentItem); 
       			 self.update();      
       			// p("showItem: suspendEnable "+command);
       			 suspendEnable(command);
       		 }, function(error){
       			a(error);
       			self.itemLoadings["i"+item.id] = false;
       		 }, command);             		        		
    	};  
    };       
    
    self.decodeItem = function(item){
    	 //item.icon = item.icon.split(" ").join("+");
		 item.city = u(item.city);
		 item.region = u(item.region);
		 item.name = u(item.name);
		 item.description = u(item.description);	    	
		return item;
    };    
     
    cataloguePanel = self;	   
};
 

</script>
</head>

<script> 
 var openForumInProgress = false;
 var openForum = function() {
	if(!root.loged){
		selectPanel('mainMenu/entrance');
		a("<s:t>,  !</s:t>"); 
		return;
    }	
	if(openForumInProgress){
		a("<s:t> ...</s:t>"); 
		return;
	}
	openForumInProgress = true;
	Server.call("forumService", "getForumLink", [location.host +"/"+location.pathname, lang], 
		function(link){		
		    openForumInProgress = false;
			ge("forumLinkForm").setAttribute("action", link);		
			ge("forumLinkForm").submit();				
			hideAlertMessage();
		}, function(error){
			openForumInProgress = false;
			a(translateForumError[error] || error);
		}
	);	
  };   
  var translateForumError = {
		  "forum_unavailable": "<s:t> !</s:t>",
  };

</script>

		   <td class="nobr"><input type="text" x-ng-model="captchaAnswer" style="width: 88px; margin-left: 0px;" maxlength="6"/>	  		
		      <input id="refreshCaptchaButton" class="btn btn-info" type="button" x-ng-click="getCaptcha($event.target)" 
		             value="" title="  "  style="margin-left: 12px;">	      
		   </td>  
		   <td title="4-6 " align="right">
		    	<div 
			    style="width: 180px;"  class="alert alert-warning nobr" 			    			    
			    x-ng-show="captchaAnswer.length < 4">
				          				         		    	    
				</div>
				<div 
			    style="width: 180px;"  class="alert alert-success nobr" 			    			    
			    x-ng-show="captchaAnswer.length >= 4">
				          				         		    	    
				</div>		    
		   </td> 		   
		   
		  </tr>	
		 </table>
		</td>  
		</tr>		
		<tr x-ng-show="!isShop">
			<td align="left" colspan="3" style="padding-left: 16px;" class="nobr">
			 <label><input type="checkbox" x-ng-model="agree" style="margin-right: 12px;">  
			 </label>,  
			 <span x-ng-click="selectPanel('mainMenu/home')" class="command"> </span>    
			</td>
		</tr>			
		<tr>
			<td align="left" colspan="2" style="padding-left: 16px; padding-top: 12px;">
			 <input style="width: 234px;" 
			 x-ng-disabled=
			 "captchaAnswer == '' || (!agree && !isShop) || nick == '' || login == '' || password.length < 2 || registered || registrationInProgress"
				value="{{ registered ? ' ' : ' '}}" 
				type="button" x-ng-click="registerUser($event.target)" class="btn btn-success btn-large" />				
			</td>
			<td>
		    	<div 
			    style="width: 350px;"  class="alert alert-warning nobr" 			    			    
			    x-ng-show="!agree && !isShop">
				        ,     				         		    	    
				</div>
				<div 
			    style="width: 350px;"  class="alert alert-success nobr" 			    			    
			    x-ng-show="!!agree && !isShop">
				          				         		    	    
				</div>		    
		   </td> 
			
			
			
		</tr>	
	</table>	  

    
    <div x-ng-show="registered">       
	       <div class="alert alert-success nobr" >              
                 ,  : <b>{{registrationNick}}</b><br/>
                <span x-menu-selector="entranceMenu/login"  class="command">
                   ""</span>  .
           </div>                
           <div class="alert alert-warning nobr" style="margin-top: 12px;">              
                ,     (,  ).    
           </div>                 
    </div>  
	
	
</div>

	</div>
	</td></tr></table>
</div>
 <div x-ng-show="loged" style="height: 59px;"> 
        

<style>
.paddedTable {
	margin-bottom: 16px;
	width: 650px;
}
.paddedTable td {
	padding: 6px;
}
</style>

<table>
<tr><td colspan="2" >
<input value="  "
			type="button" style="margin-left: 550px; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 42px; height: 59px;"
			x-ng-click="logOut($event.target)" class="btn btn-large btn-warning" 
			x-ng-disabled="false"/>
</td></tr>
</table>     
     
 </div>

	
</div>


					      		    
          </td></tr></table>
</div>
<div id="footer1">
	<table style="width: 100%; color: #bbb">
		<tr>	
	
			<td align="left" style="width: 60px;">
				<p class="credit nobr" style="color: #eee;"><small>v.1.2.0</small></p>
				
			</td>									
			<td align="right"  style="width: 150px;">         
             <span class="command" x-ng-click="
             selectPanel('mainMenu/penpal'); 
             penpalPanel.setShopSellerNick();
             "> </span>             
			</td>			
			<td align="right" style="width: 200px;" >			    	    
				<!-- <p title="powered by X-Market" onclick="window.open('http://xmarket334dtd4la.onion')"
				   class="credit nobr" style="margin-left: 42px; color: #eee; cursor: pointer;">
				  <span class="command"> X-Market</span>
				   </p> -->
			</td>	
			
			
            <td></td> 
		</tr>
	</table>
</div>
</div>
</body>
</html>
